name: Mutt & Run
description:
This game was developed in 30 Days during the month of August as part of a 12 months 12 games project. 

Description

Use your finger to tap and hold the pup in place or slide downward to move the pup back. Avoid hitting the trees and collect as many treats as you can. Red bouncy balls will change your horizontal direction when hit.

Credit

Programming, Art, Animation, Sound, Music - Keith Charles

Font - "Canted FX" by Nils Cordes
